pageContext.description: Broken in 3 pieces. Diamond shaped socket, bevelled round cutting edge. 2 Rivet holes.
pageContext.patina: Bright green, light green, and some dusty brown.
pageContext.other: Width: blade 53mm; socket 27mm,Thickness: blade 19mm; socket 25mm,Weight: A) 43 gms; B) 175 gms; C) 62 gms for a total of 280 gms; A - point; B-middle; C-socket
pageContext.publications: Bronzes No. 89 (Numbers to be found in a volume entitled "Museum of Archaeology"),Prehistoric Bronzes No. 155 (Catalogue is lost)
pageContext.collection: Museum of Archaeology and Ethnology, Cambridge,Labelled: R.6,Bronze Spearhead,Wem, Shropshire,W.S. Heitland, M.A.
